name: the-lab-verse-monitoring
description: Express.js server for The Lab Verse monitoring

scripts.postinstall: if [ -d 'crewai' ]; then pip3 install -r crewai/requirements.txt; else echo 'crewai directory not found, skipping pip install'; fi
scripts.health: node -e "require('http').get('http://localhost:3000/health', r=>{console.log('✅ Health check passed'); r.on('error', e=>{console.error('❌ Health check failed:', e); process.exit(1)});}).on('error', e=>{console.error('❌ Health check failed:', e); process.exit(1)});"

author: The Lab Verse
